snippet: Udacity, a start-up that offers online college courses, will offer low-cost remedial and introductory classes to students at San Jose State University and local community colleges and high schools.
abstract: Udacity, start-up that offers online college courses, will offer low-cost remedial and introductory classes to students at San Jose State University and local community colleges and high schools; plan, if students are successful, could open door to teaching hundreds of thousands of California students at lower cost via Internet.

byline.original: By TAMAR LEWIN and JOHN MARKOFF

lead_paragraph: Udacity, a start-up that offers online college courses, will offer low-cost remedial and introductory classes to students at San Jose State University and local community colleges and high schools.

headline.main: California to Give Web Courses a Big Trial
headline.print_headline: California To Give Web Courses A Big Trial
